A lone bot walks through a deserted and run down part of the slums on
Cybertron.  Upon coming to a mound of scraps the bot sits down on and
goes to kick a small piece out from the pile when all of a sudden the
mound opens up reaveling a hole with a stiarway.  He looks into it and
transforms into his large bug monster mode and his infrared vision
comes on. He begins his long descent down into the secret chamber
holding the Autobot's ship, the 'Hidden One'.
